definitions.title: Pleiades
definitions.body: (v. supr.; NH id.; Targum [[כִּימָא]], SerVer kiymo0)—as made by ´[[י]], Am 5:8 (‖[[כְּסִיל]]), Job 9:9 (‖[[עָשׁ]], [[כְּסִיל]], [[חַדְרֵי תֵמָן]]); and under his control, ´[[מַעֲדַנּוֹת כ]] Job 38:31 (‖[[משְׁכוֹת כְּסִיל]]).—(Stern:Jüd. Zeitschr. f. Wissen. u. Leben. iii. (1864–65) 258 ff. Nö in Schenkel:BL Hoffm:ZAW iii. 107 ff. interpret [[עשׁ]] as Pleiades, and [[כימה]] as Sirius).
